If rich, continue or stop working

Source: R/gss_vars_61.R
richwork.Rd

richwork

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question If you were to get enough money to live as comfortably as you would like for the rest of your life, would you continue to work or would you stop working?

Values

  • [1] continue to work

  • [2] stop working

  • [NA(d)] don't know [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook

Question Years and Ballots

ballotsyears
-/-1973, 1974, 1976, 1977, 1980, 1982, 1984, 1985, 1987
A/C1988, 1989, 1990, 1991, 1993, 1994, 1996, 1998, 2000, 2002, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2014, 2016, 2018, 2021, 2022, 2024

Overview

For further details see the GSS Data Explorer page for richwork.
